headline: 'Just Beginning,' Awardco Founder On The Superpower That Allowed Him To Build A $1 Billion Business
summary: Awardco co-founder and CEO Steve Sonnenberg says there's one thing that took his company from side hustle to $1 billion business: the ability to just get started. "When it comes to entrepreneurship, my superpower is all about just beginning," Sonnenberg told CNBC last week. "It's very easy for me to start, because that's just who I am."
